_comment: Map OIDC groups (e.g., from Microsoft EntraID via Keycloak) to Cognee roles
_description: Each key is an OIDC group name, values are arrays of Cognee role names to assign
_notes: Group names must match exactly as they appear in the OIDC token claims
For Microsoft EntraID groups, this is typically the group display name or object ID
Multiple groups can map to the same role
Users will receive the union of all roles from all their groups
If no groups match, OIDC_DEFAULT_ROLE is assigned
